title: Back to school: How are you finding it?
description:
Back to school isn't just about books and homework- it's also about friends, learning news things and having fun.
We want to hear how you have found being back at school...
content:
Back to school isn't just about books and homework- it's also about friends, learning news things and having fun.

You may have been back at school a little while, or perhaps you just started back this week.

Maybe you have moved to a new school, or a new classroom. Have you got some new stationary that you particularly love? Or is there a lesson you have started doing this year that is already becoming your favourite?

The start of a new school year is an exciting and sometimes nerve wracking time, so we want to hear all about it.

Tell us in the comments what you are loving about being back at school.
summary: The article discusses the start of a new school year, with an eagerness for readers to share their experiences. The article also discusses how they find it, with suggestions of new teachers, teachers, and parents. The authorises the publication of the article.
argos_summary: The article invites readers to share their experiences of returning to school, highlighting the excitement and nerves of a new academic year. It encourages discussion about new schools, classrooms, stationery, and favorite lessons. The tone is upbeat, asking readers to comment on what they love about being back at school.
